meanings.definition: A nutrient that is essential for human health.
meanings.sent1: Choline is crucial for our well-being.
meanings.sent2: Our bodies need choline to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to buy groceries, so now I'm missing out on choline!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like choline for my soul, nourishing and vital.
meanings.sent5: Imagine choline as the fuel that keeps our bodies running smoothly.

meanings.definition: A type of organic compound that is important for brain function.
meanings.sent1: The brain relies on choline to work properly.
meanings.sent2: Choline plays a key role in brain health.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could download more choline for my brain like in a video game!
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed like choline through the neurons of the organization.
meanings.sent5: Picture your brain as a garden, with choline as the essential fertilizer for growth.

meanings.definition: A substance that is found in foods like eggs and liver.
meanings.sent1: Eggs are a good source of choline.
meanings.sent2: Liver contains high levels of choline.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled choline all over the kitchen while cooking!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of choline-rich foods filled the room, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent5: As the chef sprinkled choline into the dish, its flavor transformed into something extraordinary.
